page.title: 10MUNDON VILLAGE
page.content: There are 328 people in Mundon,the village hall was called the{Victory {Hall}it was the first village hall to be opened after the War. The Church was and is called{St Mary's}it is very old and is being restored, the School has been closed for a long time and is now in wrecks. The Church, School and Mundon hall were the centre of the Village but a plague came and the people moved.{The White horse}has been in Mundon for a long time. In Mundon there was a shop but it had to be closed because hardly anybody used it. The post office and garage has been closed aswell.{White House Manor is probably the main attraction.
